definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
worn out in body and soul (idiom)
wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
worn out in body and soul (idiom)

sentences.english: And when finally I put it down, my mind was totally refreshed.
sentences.chinese: 最后放下书来时，我倦意全消，身心为之一爽。

sentences.english: The hardship of body and mind of man of A phoenix show solicitude for, more help him prostitute of outer call together.
sentences.chinese: 阿凤体恤丈夫身心的辛苦，更帮助他在外召妓。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界卫生日，我祝愿你们大家身心健康。

sentences.english: Yuan Longping devoted himself to his work.
sentences.chinese: 袁隆平全身心投入到工作中。

sentences.english: Correlation analysis showed there was relationship between pet owning and health.
sentences.chinese: 相关分析表明，是否拥有宠物犬与身心健康显著相关。

sentences.english: Health administers to peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 健康有助于身心的安宁。

sentences.english: Lively and vivacious, Bettie was her father's favourite.
sentences.chinese: 生动而活泼，身心愉快是她父亲的喜爱。

sentences.english: For some people, mind body techniques such as meditation also might be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 对于某些人，身心技巧如冥思也是有用的。

sentences.english: But I can tell you that it was physically and emotionally exhausting.
sentences.chinese: 但是我可以告诉你的是，它是一种身心俱疲的过程。

sentences.english: But just because you're unnerved doesn't mean you're a lousy investor.
sentences.chinese: 不过身心交瘁并不一定意味着你就是个糟糕的投资者。

sentences.english: The human's body and heart were heavily vandalized under such environment.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的环境下人的身心受着极大的摧残。

sentences.english: Working overtime for days made him mentally and physically exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 加班使他身心十分疲敝。

sentences.english: You will feel the physical and mental pleasure, high, reaching from the two forgotten realms.
sentences.chinese: 你会感到身心愉悦，飘飘欲仙，达到物我两忘的境界。

sentences.english: but also to just stay happy, stay healthy and happy, so.
sentences.chinese: 同时还要快快乐乐地学习，保持身心健康。

sentences.english: We will train our hearts and bodies for a firm unshaking spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我们要磨练身心，养成坚固不拔的精神。

definition: wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
to cultivate the heart and nurture the character (idiom); to improve oneself by meditation
to untie/to free/to absolve of/to get free of/to extirpate oneself/(Buddhism) to free oneself of worldly worries
